PHRASE.LANG: Ebenezer will keep them company when you're not around. [#Legal]
Ebenezer leur tiendra compagnie quand vous serez absent. [#Legal]
Ebenezer leistet ihnen Gesellschaft, wenn du nicht da bist. [#Legal]
Ebenezer gli farà compagnia quando tu non ci sei. [#Legal]
Ebenezer les hará compañía cuando tú no estés. [#Legal]
여러분이 없을 때는 에버니저가 그들의 친구가 되어 줄 겁니다. (장식품) [#Legal]
Ebenezer will keep them company when you're not around. [#Legal]
你不在時就讓Ebenezer給他們作伴吧 。 [#Legal]
你不在時就讓Ebenezer給他們作伴吧 。 [#Legal]
Ebenezer will keep them company when you're not around. [#Legal]
